mercenary.name: mercenary
passives: 'Battle Buddy': Whenever Kruber receives temporary health, the closest ally within 50 units also gains 50% of the temporary health
Can now use the Bretonnian Sword and Shield.

talents.name: Stand Clear
changes: On Paced Strike trigger, increase party dodge distance, dodge speed, movement speed, damage reduction by 10% and dodge count by 1.

talents.name: Black Market Supplies
changes: Party gains 10% reload speed and max ammunition.

talents.name: Paced Strike
changes: Paced Strikes and Battle Buddy now spreads to nearby allies.
Battle Buddy radius reduced to 20 units and temporary health given reduced to 17.5%.

talents.name: Ready for Action
changes: Each enemy hit with Morale Boost grants Markus 1% melee power for 10 seconds, max 25%.

talents.name: On Yer Feet, Mates!
changes: Morale Boost now revives knocked down allies and gives the party 15% attack speed for 10 seconds.
Temporary Health given reduced to 15.

huntsman.name: huntsman
passives: Can now use the Bretonnian Sword and Shield.

foot-knight.name: foot knight
passives: Can now use the Bretonnian Sword and Shield.
Can now use the Tuskgor spear.

talents.name: Virtue of the Ideal
changes: Killing enemies now increases power level by 10%.

talents.name: Virtue of the Penitent
changes: Strength pot requirements increased (400 kills)

talents.name: Virtue of Impetuous Knight
changes: now grants 10% attack speed for 15 seconds.
Reduces cooldown to 40s.

talents.name: Virtue of Confidence
changes: now cleaves and staggers enemies, up to 6 elites or 1 chaos warrior.
Increases cooldown to 75s.

talents.name: Last Resort
changes: Bardin gains 100% cooldown regen and 10% movement speed when out of ammo.

talents.name: Foe-Feller
changes: When Bardin kills an elite or special with a ranged weapon, he refills 10% ammunition, gains 10% reload speed and attack speed for 4 seconds.

talents.name: Drunken Brawler
changes: Bardin no longer drops ammo pouches, instead killing a special now drops ale which grants 5% healing effectiveness and 33% cooldown regen for 3 minutes when consumed.
Stacks for 3 times.
15% healing effectiveness and 99% cooldown regen

talents.name: Scavenger
changes: No longer drops Ammunition.
For every monster killed, Bardin drops a healing item which he does not have currently.
For every 12 specials killed, Bardin drops a potion which he does not have currently.
For every 40 elites killed, Bardrin drops a bomb which he does not have currently.

talents.name: Surprise Guest
changes: Disengaging stealth does not break beyond the smoke cloud.
Now also conceals allies in the area granting them 25% movement.

talents.name: Hack and Slash
changes: Headshot damage -50% and random crits disabled.
+20% attack speed, +10% melee power and +30% cleave power.
Melee attacks can now directly break shields.

talents.name: Impatience
changes: Each stack of Trophy Hunter increased attack speed by 5%.

talents.name: Adrenaline Surge
changes: Increases cooldown regeneration by 67% per stack.

talents.name: Barge
changes: Effective dodges pushes nearby small enemies out of the way.
Increases dodge range by 10%.

talents.name: Crunch
changes: increases stagger effect when landing on infantry enemies using Leap by 200%.

talents.name: Dawi Drop
changes: Attack damage increased by 150% while airborne during leap.
Leap can be activated a second time within 10 seconds.

talents.name: No Escape
changes: Leap now gives 40% attack speed.
Also increasing movement speed and power level by 20% for the duration.

talents.name: Piercing Shot
changes: Headshot cooldown refund made more consistent.

talents.name: Loaded Bow
changes: Fires 2 additional arrows (5 total).
automatically targeting specials.

talents.name: Cruelty
changes: Increases critical strike damage bonus by 70%.

talents.name: Exploit Weakness
changes: Successive Backstabs increase backstab damage by 30% and damage dealt by 5% for 5 seconds.
Stacks up to 4 times.

talents.name: Bloodfletcher
changes: After backstabbing an enemy, the next ranged shot does not consume ammunition.
increase ranged power and critical chance by 10%.
If the enemy killed is an elite or special, activate blur.

talents.name: Hungry Wind
changes: Infiltrate no longer grants bonus damage.
Undetectable duration reduced to 1 second.
Leaving infiltrate grants 20% movement speed, 20% critical power and guaranteed melee critical strike chance for 6 seconds.

talents.name: Cloak of Pain
changes: Infiltrate no longer grants undetectable.
When the initial infiltrate ends, a second infiltrate is triggered.
When the second infiltrate ends, a third (and final) infiltrate is triggered.

talents.name: Surge of Malic
changes: Kerillian deals 25% extra damage to enemies who are bleeding or poisoned.

talents.name: Atharti’s Delight
changes: Melee strikes against Blackvenomed targets make them bleed three times per stack.

talents.name: Briar’s Malice
changes: When a party member uses his ability, grant Kerillian 2 guaranteed Critical Strikes.

talents.name: Recursive Toxin
changes: Blackvenom effects now stack 3 times.

talents.name: Lingering Blackvenom
changes: AoE range increased by 2 times.

witch-hunter-captain.name: witch hunter captain
passives: Can now use the Holy Great Hammer.

talents.name: Templar’s Knowledge
changes: Tagged enemies take 30% more damage.
When Victor kills an elite or special, grant 30% cooldown regeneration and 10% damage reduction to the entire party for 10 seconds.

talents.name: I Shall Judge you All!
changes: No longer grants 25% critical strike chance. Instead, grant 10% damage, critical strike chance, attack speed and damage reduction.

bounty-hunter.name: bounty hunter
passives: Can now use the Holy Great Hammer.

zealot.name: zealot
passives: HP bar is converted to THP upon ult.

talents.name: Faith’s Flurry
changes: Melee attacks during Holy Fervour increases melee damage by 5% for 5 seconds.
Stacks up to 10 times.

talents.name: Feel Nothing
changes: Health cannot be reduced below 1 for the duration of Holy Fervour.
Victor no longer charges forward.
When Holy Fervour is finished, heal 25% of the damage taken during Holy Fervour.

talents.name: Flagellant’s Zeal
changes: During Holy Fervour, Victor gains 30% movement speed and power level.

talents.name: Blazing Bright
changes: Taking damage grants Victor 300% Fury.
Entering Righteous Fury grants Victor Shield of Faith.

talents.name: From Fury, Fortitude
changes: Each kill grants an additional 2 fury.
During Righteous Fury, each kill restores health to the party and gives Victor 2 THP.

talents.name: United in Prayer
changes: Shield of Faith affects the whole party for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Flamestrike’s Tutelage
changes: Melee critical hits reduce the cooldown of The Burning Head by 3%.
Can only be triggered every second.
